scripts.build-client: cd client && REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build
scripts.build-client-dev: cd client && REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true npm run build
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client
